name: Stirling-PDF
short_description: Powerful locally hosted web-based PDF manipulation tool.
description: Powerful locally hosted web-based PDF manipulation tool. Stirling-PDF is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, pdf, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Stirling-PDF on your home server to powerful locally hosted web-based pdf manipulation tool without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Stirling-PDF to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
